# gitea_team (Data Source)

Use this data source to retrieve information about an existing team within a Gitea organization.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the team to look up.
- `org` (String) The name of the organization that owns the team.

### Read-Only

- `can_create_org_repo` (Boolean) Whether team members can create repositories in the organization.
- `description` (String) The description of the team.
- `id` (Number) The numeric ID of the team.
- `includes_all_repositories` (Boolean) Whether the team has access to all repositories in the organization.
- `units_map` (Map of String) A map of unit names to permission levels (e.g., `repo.code`: `read`, `repo.issues`: `write`).
